content: **whorl** *noun* * something that turns or goes around in a circle * an arrangement of leaves petals etc that forms a circle around a stem * a lacy loop of leaves to warm your neck ----------- **materials ** malabrigo yarn lace 100% merino wool 470 yds/430 m or any laceweight yarn 1 skein the cowl shown used approximately 360 yards of yarn size 5 3 75 mm 24 -long circular needle **finished dimensions ** 26 circumference 18 from top to bottom edges the circumference of the cowl can be adjusted by adding/subtracting stitches in multiples of 12 gauge is unimportant for this project but for good drape and ease of blocking your knitting should be loose if you knit tightly go up a needle size **caveat this pattern has not been test-knitted ** if you come across any mistakes or problems *please* let me know thanks
